item.title: Understanding the Exception.HResult property in C#
item.description: Since launching support for showing parsed HRESULT on the elmah.io UI, we have received a few questions about HRESULTs in general. While I understand that HRESULTs is probably not on everyone's radar, I think a general understanding will help with debugging. In this post, I'll asd Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/understanding-the-exception-hresult-property-in-c/
